column5: Nothing to see here  just trying to do something positive but the trolls have come out and highjacked yet another otherwise productive thread.  See you guys around the water or woods.
Reason for stocking Atlantics is well known - to guarantee federal funding for lamprey control.
To show that the mnr can waste money on programs that really don't work...oh wait, I'm sounding like Cronzy
It's far for me to travel but what does she look like?
Your bad!!!
its not the MNR that is doing it... it is ... the ofah and some wine company from austrailia ..

Thanks for the heads up.  You failed to mention what time it starts.  My guess would be 7 if it is on a week night.  I am lucky to get home by 7 and I am an hour and a half from there.  I will however be heading to the lake Ontario salmon and trout symposium in Mississauga.  At least that is on a Saturday.  In early April if I remember correctly.  Edit.  Correcting stupid iPhones auto correct.  Lol
My apologies, I was under the impression the the mnr were responsible for the stocking of Lake O...
i'm tellin J
moral to the story. Controversial topics create controversy and opinions.And everyone has one.I"m sure you knew that. i appologize for my part.

Dan, certainly you can't believe that everyone on this forum would be onside with the topic of the aforementioned meeting?  It's bound to raise opinions both pro and con and I'd have hoped you'd have been prepared for that?
it always surprises me when people are upset that people are giving their opinion on a discussion forum  maybe it could have been put in announcements and locked
the problem with relevant fishing posts being moved to "announcements" is that they dont get the same amount of views as "which snowblower should i buy?"
Why do we bother posting  cause we can.
I like to post just so people can make fun of my avatar!
you kinda look familiar.Yer not Eds son are ya
not all of us are against stocking atlantics.  no need to delete your post.
2 million stocked 80-100 returns you be the judge

We post because we feel we have something important to say, or we post because what we are thinking, may help someone in here cope with everyday troubles. We post because we believe in something strongly.We post to help people decide. We post to congratulate each other on our triumphs, or to comfort each other on our losses. Sometimes serious, somtimes funny, somtimes down rite silly.We post to say Hi !!! WE ARE STILL HERE !!! What ever you need, we will help. At least thats why I post
Things are getting cheesy in here now...  I post because I like talking about fishing.
